class_notes: Section #200 is for MN Semester 2 students only. Must seek permission from faculty to enroll. Online asynchronous with some synchronous sessions.
course_description: Students will use critical thinking and clinical reasoning skills to integrate and synthesize content related to planning and providing comprehensive nursing care. This course is designed to provide additional content review for success in transitioning to professional nursing practice.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3941, Section #: 200, Type: SEM, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Bass/Mueller, Status: Closed
